answers.answer: i don't think you're supposed to eat anything at all.
Alikat1205 is right...I think you're supposed to fast prior to this test.
ya you can't eat anything...sorry it is gross but if you make it cold it is a little better
They told me no food after midnight (my test was in the morning).  Good luck!p.s. I did feel really sleepy after that drink.

Thanks everyone! It actually wasnt that bad at all. It didnt taste that bad and for once it didnt make me lightheaded or anything. Ill know the results tomorrow. My paperwork they sent for the test said to eat a light breakfast but not alot of sugar,s o I ate a buttered pc. of toast. LOL  Other than that, everything lloks great and Ive finally gained 6 lbs this pregnancy so far, but hes growing, so all is good! Thanks again ladies!!

question: Hey ladies! I go this morning for my gest. diabetes test :(  Ugh!!  Anyway, anyone have any ideas on what is "safe" to eat before testing? Im scared if I dont eat, Ill get sick :0   Im soooo dreading drinking that c r a p!  From what I can remember , it made me lightheaded and sleepy when I took it with my last pregnancy. Did it affect anyone else in a bad way? Thanks for any help!
title: GD test question....
